name: hooey
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
something that is not true or does not make sense, although some people may believe it: He basically says that the theory is all hooey. That's a bunch of hooey.
More examplesFewer examples Alternative medicine? Much of it is hooey based on extravagant claims. He's an archaeologist who is an expert in rooting out historical hooey.It may sound like a bunch of hooey, but if it helps reduce pain, do you really care?It's poorly written sentimental hooey.
